newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Guinness Ireland unveils marketing campaign.
newsitem.headline: Guinness Ireland unveils marketing campaign.

text.p: Guinness Ireland on Monday launched a 12 million punt integrated marketing campaign for Guinness stout based on the theme The Big Pint'.

This is the first integrated campaign for Guinness Plc's Irish division and will include television, radio, outdoor and press advertising in conjunction with trade communications and consumer promotions.
The campaign is directed at younger drinkers aged 18-24 years and further stages of the campaign are planned for Christmas and early 1997.

The television advertising campaign comprises three 60 second commercials in which three wisemen, a Chinese man, an Indian and an American Indian, ponder how the Big Pint of Guinness can fit in a human hand.
They conclude "Don't ponder it, just drink it".
